actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Labor to provide legal representation for veterans claiming to be entitled to veterans' reemployment benefits under such title.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor, under specified conditions, to provide legal representation for veterans claiming to be entitled to veterans' reemployment benefits and to assign such cases priority over all other civil cases.
